projects.title: Smoke alert bot
projects.description: AI powered smoke alert bot for forest fires monitoring
projects.html:
Telegram BOT development


I have been part of the development of an innovative project that aims to use AI and video cameras to monitor forests for the early detection of wildfires.

By placing cameras strategically, the system records live videos and uses AI algorithms to analyze them in real time. This helps to quickly spot potential fires by identifying changes in temperature and the environment, and it sends immediate alerts to forest authorities for quick action.

The project is flexible and can be expanded, and ongoing improvements to the AI model make it more accurate.

This project highlights how technology can help protect the environment and prevent the damaging effects of forest fires on ecosystems and communities.

Tech stack

  • Python
  • Telegram.ext

projects.title: Subbly.co
projects.description: Subbly.co is a cutting-edge e-commerce platform designed for online marketplaces utilizing a subscription-first model.
projects.html:
Senior Frontend Developer

Subbly.co

2023-11 - 2024-12


Key Responsibilities:

Engineering:

Subbly.co is a cutting-edge e-commerce platform designed for online marketplaces utilizing a subscription-first model.

My role is development of the platform, ensuring seamless user experiences for both merchants and customers.


Responsibilities

  • Developed and maintained responsive, high-performance user interfaces.
  • Worked closely with UX/UI designers and backend developers.
  • Implemented features such as subscription management and payment processing.
  • Optimized web applications for speed and scalability.
  • Participated in code reviews to ensure code quality.
